name: RelaxScramble
description:
A jigsaw board game to relax your mind and body to with soothing music and images. Bored in office or need a break nothing beats some slow music and some cute/medieval/sporty vibes to charge you.

Let me know if you want more calming puzzles and music

- Special thanks to Pixabay for photos and music.

- Thank you to tykillough for his bgm - https://tyekillough.itch.io/50-songs-for-your-projects

- Thank tidoMiner for the base game
